# TasoSky - LinkedIn Profile Integration

## Quick Summary for LinkedIn

**Project Name:** TasoSky  
**Type:** iOS Mobile Application  
**Tech Stack:** Swift, SwiftUI, Combine, NASA API  
**Status:** Open Source  
**GitHub:** https://github.com/tahsinmert/TasoSky

## One-Liner Description

Modern iOS space exploration app featuring interactive planets, asteroid tracking, and Mars weather data, built with SwiftUI and NASA API.

## Short Description (2-3 sentences)

TasoSky is a beautifully designed iOS application that brings space exploration to your fingertips. Built with SwiftUI, it features interactive 3D planet views, real-time asteroid tracking, and Mars weather data from NASA's InSight Lander. The app combines modern UI/UX design with real NASA data to create an engaging educational experience.

## Key Achievements

- ✅ Developed complete iOS app from scratch
- ✅ Integrated NASA API for real-time space data
- ✅ Implemented advanced UI features (parallax scrolling, 3D animations)
- ✅ Created reusable components and architecture
- ✅ Open source project with comprehensive documentation

## Skills Demonstrated

- iOS Development
- Swift Programming
- SwiftUI Framework
- API Integration
- UI/UX Design
- Reactive Programming (Combine)
- Async/Await Programming
- Git/GitHub
- Open Source Development

## Metrics (if applicable)

- 3 main features (Planets, Asteroids, Mars Weather)
- 8 planets with detailed information
- Real-time asteroid tracking (7-day forecast)
- Mars weather data from InSight Lander
- 100% SwiftUI implementation
- Fully open source

## LinkedIn Project Section Format

### Title
TasoSky - Space Exploration iOS App

### Date
November 2025 - Present

### Description
Developed a modern iOS space exploration application using SwiftUI and NASA API. The app features:

• Interactive solar system with 3D animated planet views
• Near-Earth asteroid tracking with advanced filtering and sorting
• Real-time Mars weather data from NASA's InSight Lander
• Beautiful dark theme UI with parallax scrolling effects
• Comprehensive documentation and open source availability

**Technologies:** Swift, SwiftUI, Combine, NASA API, iOS Development

**GitHub:** https://github.com/tahsinmert/TasoSky
